quoteText: To register for an account you must be at least 13 years old. To give or receive pledges you must be at least 18 years old or have your parent’s permission. If you know a user is under the age of 13, please report them to us.
title: This service is only available to users 13 years old and over; pledges are only for users at least 18 years old or with parental permission

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "To register for an account you must be at least 13 years old. To give or receive pledges you must be at least 18 years old or have your parent’s permission. If you know a user is under the age of 13, please report them to us."
